body:
Chapter 69: Quarter-finals matches (7)

Chapter 69: Quarter-finals matches (Part 7)


With the passage of time, a white light suddenly shot out from the dust and float in the sky. After a closer look, it was actually Li Xinyun. Right now the white colored light barrier before her body was a bit dim, even the radiances of the 3 illusion energy ball had also become a bit dimmer. She had a trace of blood stain on the corner of her mouth, and contrary to what one might expect there was no big injuries on her.


“I never expected your speed to be this fast. From the very beginning I had taken a precautions against your speed, my illusion light wings were exactly for this purpose, but I had still underestimated your demonic speed.” Li Xinyun slowly said.


Hearing the words of Li Xinyun, Ren Tianyou didn’t say anything, merely quietly stared at Li Xinyun who was floating in the air.


“Although it is almost impossible for me to win this match, nevertheless I will struggle with all my strength till the end.” Finished speaking, Li Xinyun clapped her hand together, suddenly the 3 energy balls floating around her twinkled with a strong white colored illusion energy. Along with the move of Li Xinyun, the illusion energy slowly spread all over and covered the air around them.


“Illusion skill—boundless confusion domain!” Along with the shout of Li Xinyun, immediately the illusion power around them moved, along with the thought of Li Xinyun, and at the field of vision of Ren Tianyou, suddenly a dramatic change occurred.


The arena had vanished, and currently he was standing at the endless maze. And all around him, there were only damp cliff.


“Quite capable eh?” Seeing the changes around him, Ren Tianyou smiled. Just at that time Ren Tianyou suddenly sensed that a strange sound was coming through the cliff around him. He turned his head only to see, that countless stones had suddenly appeared from the cliff, and was slowly advancing towards him. After that under his foot, he suddenly sensed that the earth’s surface underneath his foot had become soft, and saw that the earth’s surface had suddenly changed into purple and black colored quagmire. Then his body was ceaselessly sinking into this quagmire.


Quietly looking at the changes around him, Ren Tianyou slowly formed a hand seal with his both hand, “Although this illusion is quite lifelike, and illusion ability also not bad but it’s too bad as your opponent was me. Release!”


Along with the explosive shout from Ren Tianyou, the surrounding around quickly disappeared, and after his field of vision restored, he found himself still standing at the original location of the arena. And all the stones, cliff, maze and quagmire had completely disappeared.


“You…….” Seeing Ren Tianyou had easily destroyed her illusion in a flash, Li Xinyun was shocked within her heart and didn’t know what to say.


“I think it’s better to not waste any more time, beautiful lady, honestly speaking, your illusions are very powerful, but illusions don’t work on me. I think you might as well concede early, I really don’t want to hit a flower.” Staring at Li Xinyun floating in the air, Ren Tianyou suggested.


“I will never admit a defeat.” Hearing Ren Tianyou, Li Xinyun firmly shook her head and replied.


“In this case, I have no other choice. I have to win this match, so as far as possible I will try not use too much force.” Seeing Li Xinyu was unlikely to give up, although he had already guessed this result, but he still couldn’t help but shook his head. Then his hinds quickly formed a hand seals. “Raiton—Raigen Raikochu!” (Lightning Illusion—Flash Pillar)


“Swish!” Along with the completion of forming the seals, suddenly an intense dazzling rays of light sprang out from the body of Ren Tianyou, and that radiances caused Li Xinyun and all the audiences watching the battle unable to open their eyes.


Just when everyone were rubbing their tearful eyes which was stung with an intense light, they heard few faint words, “Rasengan.” Then it revert back to quietness.


When everyone’s vision were restored, everyone were greatly surprised. As they saw on the arena, Ren Tianyou was still standing at the original location, but he was carrying already fainted Li Xinyun in his arms.


Everyone were looking at the arena with a strange expression on his eyes, and especially seeing Sun Chuqian and several others’ expression in their eyes, even though he was quite thick-skinned, he couldn’t help but blushed a little. Hastily turning his head towards the judge who was equally staring blankly, he yelled, “Hey, didn’t you see the match is over already? Still not announcing the result of the match.”


“Ah……..oh oh.” Hearing Ren Tianyou, the judge finally react. He quickly removed the barrier, came up in the arena, and then gave Ren Tianyou his identity plate. After that he turned his head towards the audiences and announced, “I declare Ren Tianyou as a winner of this match.”


After judge announced the result, immediately Ren Tianyou holding Li Xinyun in his embrace disappeared from the arena.


“Ha ha, Tianyou, congratulation on winning the match, but you are also too awesome, actually hitting and knocking out the famous beauty our academy and holding her in your embrace. You ox, just take a look around at the expression in the eyes of the male students.” Seeing Ren Tianyou returning while carrying one of the greatest beauty of their academy, Wang Haiqing immediately opened his mouth.


“Eh.” Hearing Wang Haiqing, Ren Tianyou immediately turned around to look. Seeing the sight behind him, he couldn’t help but became terrified within his heart, even though he was quite powerful. The eyes of all the male students around were burning with anger and were staring at him, some were even grinding their teeth, and some were staring at lower part of his body’s back. Seeing this Ren Tianyou suddenly felt a chill, and his chrysanthemum also tighten.


“Ha ha, Tianyou, I believe tomorrow’s headline of the academy will be you. At that time you will definitely become very famous in this academy.” Sun Chuqian covered her mouth and charmingly laughed.


“Humph, I see your injuries are already healed, Chuqian, actually you have the strength to laugh at me.” Hearing the teasing voice of Sun Chuqian, Ren Tianyou coldly snorted.


“That’s for sure. After the light system healing magic of schoolmate Li Shui, my injuries are already healed. Now only few days of rest is enough for a full recovery.”


Just as Ren Tianyou was about to say something, suddenly he sensed the movement from Li Xinyun in his embrace. Ren Tianyou immediately turned his head to look, and saw that Li Xinyun slowly opened her beautiful eyes. Then she looked around with confusion, trying to understand where she was. At the final moment of her memory, she saw the body of Ren Tianyou suddenly released an intense light, so she had no choice but to close her two eyes, then she sensed her powerful energy barrier was suddenly broken in an instant, after that she felt a pain in her nape. After that she didn’t know anything at all.


Opening her eyes, Li Xinyun looked all around her, and suddenly discovered something unusual with her body. After careful examination, suddenly she found that she was lying on the embrace of Ren Tianyou. And all those peoples around were looking at her with a peculiar expression on their eyes.


“Ah.” Li Xinyun immediately screamed, and struggled free from the embrace of Ren Tianyou. In a flash the color of her face became red through and through, don’t know whether that was from being angry or shy.


“You rogue, drop dead.” Li Xinyun yelled in her charming voice, then waved her hand and slapped the face of Ren Tianyou. ‘Pa’ clear and melodious sound of slap in the face rang out, the finger print of 5 fingers appeared on the face of Ren Tianyou. After slapping Ren Tianyou, she immediately ran outside the square, leaving behind the stunned Ren Tianyou.
